column2:
"<%me>!
It seems Kyokuya's been investigating you recently."
"He's even accessed the database... What's going on with him?"
"...Halt."
"Eek...! E-Excuse me!"

"...<%me>.
I was compelled to look into your past."

"A hero who saved the world...
Truly one worthy of legend.
You are the hope of all ARKS..."
"However... Should such a vast hope fall...it mutates into an equally vast despair."
"If the source of the hopes and dreams of all were to vanish... Have you considered what might happen then?"

"<%me>...
You should not have become their hope."
"You should never have existed at all."
"...Save your spite, Guardian. Even if you were to meet your end now...it would not save them from their despair."
"You must do your best to survive. For them... As the hope of all ARKS."
"What... paralyzed with fear? Very well. Then in order to help you survive..."
"I shall bestow upon you my fearsome \"Aria\"!"
"O' \"Shadow\", o' abyssal darkness that drowns out the \"Light\". Become my power, become the fang that fells the foolish, PHANTOM...!"
"...Well?"
"It was a very fearsome aria."
"I don't know how to respond..."
"Hmhmhm... You may possess the makings of a Phantom. Very well, I shall enlighten you."
"Hmhmhm... stricken with fear? The knowledge of Phantom... Very well, I shall enlighten you."
"If Hero is the class of \"power\"... Phantom is the class of \"execution\"."
"Do not be mistaken. Our strength comes not from physical or technical execution, but the power of the great executioner, the \"shadow\"."
"But I suppose you need not be told. Will you make use of it? This power of \"darkness\"..."
"The willingness to use all means at hand, and emerge the victor. In order to become a true Phantom... one must possess that \"resolve\"."
"Listen once more. To the \"darkness\" within you..."
"...He's got just as interesting an outlook on the world as ever."
"Still, he has me wanting to try the Aria as well. Kyokuya really is fearsome..."
